questions.question: When is numerical integration preferred over analytical integration?

answers.b: ansWhen the exact integral cannot be calculatedwer2
answers.c: When the graph of the function is unknown
answers.d: When the function has no maximum value

questions.question: Which of the following is a limitation of the Trapezoidal Rule??

answers.a: It is only applicable to linear functions
answers.b: It requires an even number of intervals
answers.c: It may be less accurate for curved functions
